body_html:
The documentation seems to suggest that users should never invoke the __init__ method of PackedSequence. I agree that the elementwise_apply functions are a way to make this work, but it would be nice if we make the interface of PackedSequence and Tensor consistent.

The documentation seems to suggest that users should never invoke the __init__ method of PackedSequence. I agree that the elementwise_apply functions are a way to make this work, but it would be nice if we make the interface of PackedSequence and Tensor consistent.

body:
The documentation seems to suggest that users should never invoke the `__init__` method of `PackedSequence`. I agree that the `elementwise_apply` functions are a way to make this work, but it would be nice if we make the interface of `PackedSequence` and `Tensor` consistent. 

https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/0656ef483d1cd9041ad465652d3c151a60a96800/torch/nn/utils/rnn.py#L18
